CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The new polymer PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) was synthesized by coupling 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2 , 5dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione and 2,6-di(trimethyl- tin)-N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole via a Stille reaction ( Scheme 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) (mentioned as the new polymer being synthesized)
2. 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (a starting material in the synthesis)
3. 2,6-di(trimethyl-Sn)-N-[1-(20-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]-pyrrole (a starting material in the synthesis)
4. Stille reaction (a chemical reaction used in the synthesis)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) (mentioned as the new polymer being synthesized)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The new polymer PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) was synthesized by coupling 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2 , 5dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione and 2,6-di(trimethyl- tin)-N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole via a Stille reaction ( Scheme 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. "3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione" - This is a molecular entity that describes the structure of a compound.
2. "2,6-di(trimethyl-Sn)-N-[1-(20-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]-pyrrole" - This is another molecular entity that describes the structure of a compound.
3. "Stille reaction" - This is a chemical reaction entity that describes a specific reaction mechanism.

These entities are identified as "Property Value" entities because they describe the properties of the compounds being synthesized, such as their chemical structure, rather than the compounds themselves.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. "3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione" - This is a molecular entity that describes the structure of a compound and its material properties, such as its chemical structure and reactivity.
2. "2,6-di(trimethyl-Sn)-N-[1-(20-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]-pyrrole" - This is another molecular entity that describes the structure of a compound and its material properties, such as its chemical structure and reactivity.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
